properties.name: Pyramids of Giza & Sphinx
properties.description: Last surviving Ancient Wonder with 4,500-year-old pyramids and enigmatic Sphinx

properties.name: Abu Simbel
properties.description: Colossal 20m statues of Ramses II carved into cliffs, relocated to escape rising waters

properties.name: Karnak Temple (Luxor)
properties.description: Egypt's largest temple complex built over 1,000 years with massive hypostyle hall

properties.name: Valley of the Kings
properties.description: Royal necropolis with 63 tombs including Tutankhamun's in the desert cliffs
